attributes.action: Introduce a secure, government-backed Digital ID system
attributes.additional_details: A secure Digital ID would modernise the UK, cut fraud, and protect taxpayers’ money. Countries like the Netherlands and Estonia link IDs to banking, licences, and healthcare with great success. It increases security, reduces costs, and makes life easier—while ensuring citizens stay in control of their data, not “Big Brother.”
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon His Majesty’s Government to introduce a secure, government-backed Digital ID system, available on smartphones and other devices, to modernise the way UK citizens prove their identity and access services.

rejection.details: The Government has already announced its intention to introduce a digital ID scheme. You can find more information about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-digital-id-scheme-to-be-rolled-out-across-uk
